name: Talon
appearance: Tall and wiry, coral-lacquer braces on his wrists, burn-scars like lacework on his forearms, a caliper tucked into his belt.
character: Restless and visionary, pride bright as a rime-lantern; he’d rather apologize after than ask before.
talents: reads stress lines in bone at a glance
improvises braces from scrap in minutes
turns hostile crowds with a showman’s trick
dreams: Build a bone-bridge that sings true across the Span
Replace imported steel with coral composites
Surpass Yhosa and become the Collegium’s youngest dean
secrets: Stole a Shell-Scribe fragment from the Coral Library during a ‘study’ dive
Caused a micro-collapse near the Market of Teeth and paid hush money to the injured
Siphons a trickle of lacquer salts from Collegium stores for experiments
